original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṁ vivaranti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukha dvāram vivaranti pe

original: “Na anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṁ vivarissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na an āhaṭe kabaḷe mukha dvāram vivarissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
na an āhaṭe kabaḷe mukha dvāram

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṁ vivarati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukha dvāram vivarati āpatti dukkaṭassa
